Keywords: Celebrity , Mystical , Speedster
Real Name: Ralph Bohner
Special Powers
ALL-NEW HALLOWEEN SPOOKTACULAR!: Shape Change. When Pietro Maximoff uses it and succeeds, heal him 1 click.
SILLY STRING THE NEIGHBORHOOD: Hypersonic Speed. When Pietro Maximoff uses it, after resolutions roll a d6. 4-6: Give an action token to each opposing character he moved adjacent to during the action.
PLEASE STAND BY: STOP.

power gem on this dude makes him a menace
June 19, 2022
gambitrmp
For anyone who said don't worry about not getting HSS on the last Quicksilver, he'll have it in Disney plus, well he looks kind of dumb, he has the mystics ability which he shouldn't, this isn't a standard Quicksilver. Still haven't gotten what I wanted but it's at least closer I guess. So many SR's, he's finally not an SR and they basically still don't make a proper modern stat regular universe Quicksilver. Now the next time he's made I fear what kind of power creep we'll be up to. Eh, such is life sometimes I guess. I like the overall trick or treat them. I like "team spooktacular" but I'm still looking for a decent Quicksilver without paying for a SR or going back to piss poor stats.
June 13, 2022
Oathful
Comparing him to Tommy, this guy just feels weak. The fact that Hypersonic Speed doesn't basically guarantee a break away anymore really hinders this guy, there are much better harass figures for less points. At least he holds true to his appearance in the show. Thematic: 9/10 Viability: 4/10 Fun Factor: 5/10, leans towards casual
June 1, 2022
Bobcat2022
Hypersonic Speed still includes "Improved Movement Move Through", but yes, he's gotta risk breakaway to get the rest of his movement if he stops to make an attack. So... don't stop to make an attack. Outwit and a 50-50 shot of tokening an opponent's whole team (depending on their deployment) is enough to make him 45 points valuable in Sealed, and in Constructed there'll be ways around his issues. Half the time he'll be an untouchable golden god and half the time you'll wonder why you bothered. It's a dice game, and he is, literally, extra dice-y.
May 4, 2022
Goop
Again they failed to give a hypersonic 0 range guy improved movement. Which means if you fail your break away role you are stuck and likely dead the following turn. At least he does have SC and SS to keep him alive hopefully.
